website_summaries.verdict: A flexible sole offers all day comfort.
pros: Part of the Bendables collection with orthopedic footbed and premium leather
Style is good for those with high arches

customer_reviews.title: Great Arch support. Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sandal that provides good arch support & hides ugly bunions but at same time won't aggravate them. So far so good in both areas! The fit is perfect & these are oh so comfy! A little more pricey than what I am used to paying for sandals but worth it to be comfortable & pain free. Black was out of stock so Brown was the next choice for me. Very cute. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Salvation for your Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Really great sandal! I have poor feet and carry extra weight and this sandal is God-Sent. I can wear comfortably all day in all types of terrain and am comfortable. Worked great for the wedding with my summer dress. Thank you much!
customer_reviews.author: shoshanna

customer_reviews.title: closet full of Clarks
customer_reviews.text: After a terrible bout with Plantar-Fasciitis in 2008, I was fitted for orthotics and used them in my winter shoes. But in the summer I wanted to wear pretty but comfortable sandals but not risk another bout of Plantar-Fasciitis. I bought a pair of Clarks and not only did they feel great and look great, but they gave just the right support and I had no recurring heel problems while wearing them. I now buy Clarks summer and winter. Expensive at times but they wear well.
customer_reviews.author: WR

customer_reviews.title: I love, love, love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these shoes. The Clark's brand is well known for comfort and durability and these shoes are no exception. I highly recommend them to anyone looking for summer go-to shoes. Although I already have them in a peach color which I purchased a couple of years ago, I bought them again in red because I love them SO much.
customer_reviews.author: Spring Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoes with the intent of wearing them on an upcoming vacation but decided to test them out while attending our county fair. Lots of walking but comfortable from the get go. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Morgan

customer_reviews.title: slightly tight at first, but have stretched to perfect
customer_reviews.text: these were tight on one foot at first, so I was worried, but they have stretched after one day and now they are perfect.... I have wide feet and two different feet, so this is often a problem
customer_reviews.author: Charmarie Burke

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable!! `
customer_reviews.text: OMGoodness, these are the most comfortable, supportive shoes I own! I purchased them for a cruise I was going on, and I had been suffering from extreme sciatic pain. While the shoes didn't remove the sciatic pain, they certainly helped, and at least walking was very comfortable. Even my PT said that the height and support of these sandals are great for someone suffering sciatic pain, low back issues and flat feet. LOVE them!!!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Top-most Strap Too Large
customer_reviews.text: Like most all shoes by Clark’s, these sandals are very comfortable. They give just enough lift and springiness with the wedgy heel. I gave them only 3 stars because the uppermost strap is not adjustable and is actually quite large. I wear a medium width and have an average arch, both top and bottom. And while you do need a little “give” when stepping, the strap is simply too large. When you’re not walking, there’s a huge gap between it and your upper arch, making them look like a poor fit. If Clark’s made this adjustable with a little Velcro like they do on so many other shoes/sandals, I’d buy them again in a minute. For now, I’m returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: NIce sandal and WW option
customer_reviews.text: Cute little sandals. They fit just a very tiny bit narrow across my foot but not so much as to cause pain or blisters. The heel height is nice as I don't really wear heels anymore. Nice alternative to the clogs that I usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are so cute!! The picture doesnt do them justice.
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! I ordered them in a wide and I am glad I did. They are so cute on and I really like them. I probably could have worn a half size bigger than my normal size, but these still fit perfectly. The trio of brown colors is great. The little ball things look kind of yellow in the pictures but in person they are light brown and compliment the other colors. They are very comfortable and look really cute on.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia R

customer_reviews.title: This will be your most favorite shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The sizes run smaller so order a 1/2 size larger that you would normally wear. I live in these shoes and hate when I have to put my sneakers on. They wear great in the wet grass, no slipping at all. Very comfortable and that's saying a lot since I have flat feet and shoes hurt my feet. These shoes actually make you feel as if you're walking barefoot! I do not rush into the house to kick them off as I do others. I don't wear shoes in my house but these would be most comfortable to wear all day until bed! I love Clarks and wore them when I was a waitress! They are comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Abbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are not true to size even in the same shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe! They seem to be irregular sizes. I bought the brown leather and it was way too small. I exchanged it for one size bigger and it fits a little big. I also bought the sand leather. Both times I got those because they had to be exchanged. They have run very small and I could hardly get my foot in either the smaller or the larger size. If you don't mind taking the time to exchange back and forth till you get the right size they're a great. shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Busymomma

customer_reviews.title: great sandals; one pair mis-labeled for width at factxory
customer_reviews.text: I have this sandal in every color, and just replaced beige, blue and white through this platform (Amazon, and two private sellers). Construction fine as always, very good arch support and a versatile, attractive design and height. Hope Clark's makes this design forever. One pair was medium (my usual), one narrow (works fine). The white pair came from a private sellerand were supposedly narrow, but actually AA. Returned the latter - too bad they were evidently mis-labeled in the the factory.
customer_reviews.author: COD shopper

customer_reviews.title: I bought these for my mom for a birthday gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mom for a birthday gift. She loves Clark's, but the strap on this one is sewn in just a tad crooked. I didn't notice it when I received them, now that she's opened them and tried them on, it's too late to return them. They are gorgeous, but Clark's missed the boat sewing this pair, they dig in.
customer_reviews.author: ~CptnCaveGirl~

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT sandals for sensitive feet
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I am wearing them in the house for my work because I need to be on my feet most of the day in my kitchen, and these do not hurt at all, they keep my feet pretty comfortable. I have Lyme Disease and my feet are very sensitive and often hurt on the bottoms, so I cannot go barefoot. They are the right heel hight to keep them from hurting and they fit great, are soft and don't slip off when I walk. I will buy more shoes from this brand, and am very grateful for finding them!
customer_reviews.author: Skin2spirit

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have a serious back and spine condition and the Clark's shoes fit me and support me as I need. I walk daily to keep fit and I walk a mile or more several times a day. I usually wear them out in 6 or 7 months. Then I buy another pair of Clark's. My feet do not perspire and my toes do not cramp. The arch support keeps my spine in alignment and I don't tire as easily as I do in other shoes of this type. They are attractive and do not look like some shoes I have bought in the past.
customer_reviews.author: M. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting sandal!
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding comfortable well fitting sandals but got very lucky when I bought this pair! The light beige color blends with a lot of other colors and I actually wore them with a beautiful maxi dress for a tropical location wedding. Of course, these can also be worn with slacks, shorts, or even when going to the pool side restaurant for a meal. I also bought a black pair of the same style!
customer_reviews.author: Fun Lovin' Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Good black sandals for summer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a pair of black sandals that still look "summer-y" and this pair fit the bill perfectly. The wood tone beaded flower shape, and all the white stitching, makes it appear summer casual. Clarks are ALWAYS comfy, although, my feet swell now, and i found these not as wide as i was expecting, still, the 8wide did fit my fat feet after all. Mild amount of support to arch, just enough, just a tad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer33333

customer_reviews.title: Fit-Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased this exact sandal in another color and it was slightly larger than I liked so when I wanted a different color of this exact same shoe I sized down a half size. Received the shoe today and I can't even get my foot in it. I can tell by looking at it that it is a lot smaller in width, even though I ordered it in a wide width. Not happy having to return and pay postage for a shoe that should fit.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes available
customer_reviews.text: It is not easy to find red shoes. I love Clarks as they are comfortable and wear very well. I have found that if a shoe is made in China, it is too short and one size larger is better. If made in the US or Vietnam, they fit one's normal size. It would be convenient if the country of origin were included in the description. Clarks have been the best shoe I can find and hope that they are continued being made with the quality, fit and design that has been their selling points for a long time. Comfort is what a lot of us like and you get it with Clarks.
customer_reviews.author: TeTi

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: My mum is quite pleased. The shoe holds up to the brand and is also very attractive. It is lightweight and generally comfortable. However, if you have bunions you should be weary of the positioning of the straps in this particular design. My Mum says the bone protrudes through the straps and for long periods can be painful. She hasn't walked about much so can't attest to that aspect. The lining is also ideal for feet that perspire. Sizing was fairly accurate. My Mum would usually wear 9W but fortunately opted to go with the XW. This is consistent with the other Clarks she purchased. All in all you get quality and an attractive fit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Joseph

customer_reviews.title: I'll keep them, but they need a little work to make them comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Although these are comfortable (synonymous with Clark), they are a little narrower than my other Clarks and slightly off size to each other so that the outside of my right foot under the strap rubs a bit. Left foot feels great. When I measured, the right foot was slightly narrower than the left. Taking them to my shoe guy to see if he can widen the right foot slightly. This is why these get a 4-star rating instead of 5 stars. It's not like Clark to be inconsistent like this.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these shoes especially because I could get them in a narrow size. They are extremely comfortable and lightweight so that you hardly know you're wearing them. Have worn them all day with total comfort. Nicely made, good arch and heel cup construction helps alleviate my plantar faciitis. Nice slide sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Murph Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great fabulous shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a review only on this color but I purchased the same shoe in 3 colors. It is the MOST COMFORTABLE shoe that I have ever purchased. I am a double A and purchased this NARROW and it fits me so perfectly that I had to send a shout out to anyone out there that is looking for summer shoes. This is a fabulous find for me. Hope it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking and ill fitting
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking stitching and cheap thin “leather.” I’ve bought better quality and better fitting shoes from Payless and K-Mart for a third the price and much better looking. They are the fit is awkward. Does not fit snugly. Returning the ASAP. VERY disappointed Clark.
customer_reviews.author: Diane N Mason

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: A little tight in the middle of the foot, but I have bunion growing, I had similar of the same type of the sole before, but their quality was better. Not first time I see that what I buy in a store is much better than on Amazon. I suspect that these are not original, but didn't see them in DWS where I usually buy my Clark's and had to buy here. I'd say that they are overpriced. These quality sandals shouldn't be more than $40.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because they are nice looking, however, I had to send them back because they weren't wide enough. I found on Amazon a really cute pair of red shoes, that are actually wide, with about an inch heel and the shoe flatters, the foot. Since I could depend on the fit, I ordered another color in that brand. However, these Clarks are beautiful. It's only my chubby feet that can't in.
customer_reviews.author: aunt emma

customer_reviews.title: 💕 it
customer_reviews.text: My ten year old loves it so much she said mommy these are mines go buy you another pair. So I will be ordering a pair for myself. My daughter loves the little heel. It is comfortable and looks so cute on her.
customer_reviews.author: Kutie patooty

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for walking
customer_reviews.text: So very comfortable. Wore these on vacation in Venice, which meant miles and miles of walking everyday. These sandals were the best.
customer_reviews.author: O. K. Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't get these in black unless I ordered the wide size. My feet are close to being wide so I took a chance and ordered them. They are too wide for me to wear in the mornings, but by the end of the day when it's hot and my feet seem a little bigger they are wearable. Sturdy looking and feeling shoes that are attractive too. I always like having a little heel on my shoes as I think they make my legs look longer.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: The only shoe I can wear
customer_reviews.text: I have plantar fasciitis, which for months kept me from moving much at all. I tried inserts and night splints and all kinds of things. I decided to give these a try. They are amazing. It’s the only thing I can wear and not have any pain at all. I wear them from the moment I get out of bed until I get back in bed. I bought 3 pairs for fear of them becoming unavailable!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Too loose and not enough traction on bottom.
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are cute, but they have a couple of drawbacks. They are too loose around the top and my feet slip while walking in them. Also, the soles seem like they do not have enough traction. Unfortunately, I do not recommend these sandals and have to send them back.
customer_reviews.author: LACAN53

customer_reviews.title: True to description - it is Extra Wide Width
customer_reviews.text: This is a great everyday sandle. It is TRUE to description of being Extra Wide Width, which is a little too big for me, but still wearable. Great with jeans, summer dress, or shorts. Very light weight sandle, which I love! Would absolutely buy again (but maybe try the regular wide width).
customer_reviews.author: Angela G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect! I have a horrible time finding shoes that fit properly. And, I really wanted black sandals. I am really glad I found them in Clarks, because I have had them before, and feel they are really well made. I went to the most expensive shoe store around and nothing fit. And the closest fit was $250! I am really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: MarMed

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as it used to be
customer_reviews.text: I wear only Clarks Sandals. Ordered my normal 10 wide and can barely get my foot in them. I have a few pair of Lexi myrtles in different colors These are narrower then they used to be. I held them up to my other Lexi Myrtle 10 wides and the sole is at least a half an inch less wide.
customer_reviews.author: D. Duke

customer_reviews.title: Going to be my new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks! I needed some sandals for work. Ordered these and received them within a couple days. Right out of the box, I was thrilled they were light! Sometimes these can be heavy, but these are not! Tried them on and they were snug, but not uncomfortable. Wore them to work the next day - all day. Amazing support and comfort. NO break in time needed. I ordered another style of Clarks in another color. Don't like them as much as these so I'm returning them and ordering another pair of these in another color!
customer_reviews.author: MaryB

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe, lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to wear for everyday use. They have held up well and feel comfortable. I always feel like I will have blister before the end of the day with the pressure points in the shoe but so far that hasn't happened and no sore feet either. I would recommend these. No wear and tear after multiple uses either.
customer_reviews.author: BluIvy

customer_reviews.title: Sandals - Ideal - Foot Shape Not Compatible
customer_reviews.text: The sandals would have been perfect for me, except the outside of my big toe was "cut into" by edge and made it too painful to wear. I am disappointed that I could not wear these comfortably, but under other conditions, I would have loved to have kept them. Begrudgingly returned for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find a shoe that you can wear all day without some discomfort at the end of the day, but these are it! I have this shoe in three colors and hope Clark’s keeps this style in their line. They are true to size in width and length and the support is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: JWilkins

customer_reviews.title: Try a pair you’ll be pleased with them I’m sure
customer_reviews.text: This is the first pair of shoes that when I put them on they felt like that I had already broken them in. I wore them a full day of shopping 8 hours all over and my feet were very comfortable. The padded bottoms were great. I’m thinking of getting more of these shoes in different colors. Kudos to these shoe makers. Happy in Hawaii
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: $35 less than Clark Store
customer_reviews.text: Tried these sandals on at the Clark Store, but didn't want to pay $85. Found the same sandal on Amazon for $35 less. I noticed a couple years ago the Clark quality is not the same as it used to be plus their shoes are more narrow than they used to be. Sandals give you a little more wiggle room so these are fine. They still are very comfortable to walk it, they just don't hold up for years like their older counterparts.
customer_reviews.author: DeliberateCreator

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: The Lexi line is my favorite of the Clark's sandals. The fit is perfect, the sole molds to the shape of my arches to offer excellent support. This is my 3rd pair of Lexi Myrtle sandal. I'm bought them because Clark's seems to be limiting the production of the Lexi line.
customer_reviews.author: Poppy

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable to feet
customer_reviews.text: The top strap was so loose (large) the sandal didn't hug the foot. Very unfortunate because every Clark sandal ordered online has fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn them for any length of time yet, but upon receipt, I'm quite happy with these shoes. They are comfy and don't pinch my feet in the part that goes over the top of my foot, nor does my foot fall off either side. They really are wide width. These should be perfect for wearing this summer.
customer_reviews.author: ACustomerofAmazonWhoBuysThingsOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have BAD feet....bunions and hammertoes. Hard to find anything cute that I can walk in. These are so nice, and they are very comfortable. They’re cuter than most sandals I’ve found that work, which is a blessing. I ordered my exact size and they worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes - warned on sizing
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 8-8 1/2 but always order big when purchasing on Amazon. I’m glad I did! I purchased a size 9 and these fit great. Very comfortable to wear, gives me a little height. Perfect for casual or business casual if you thrown on a jacket with a pair of jeans.
customer_reviews.author: TBD

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Bought these shoes multiple times. I have a very wide foot with a high instep. Shoes are not my favorite thing to buy. These are very comfortable. I could wear them from day one with no break in period.
customer_reviews.author: E. Foote

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Style at Last!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals! The minute I put my foot was in the shoe, I knew they were going to be my favorite shoe. I have every foot problem a person could be plagued with (wide feet, bunions, planter's flacitious, corns & flat feet) I have a very difficult time finding stylish comfortable dress sandals--these shoes are AWESOME! Will be ordering another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie R

customer_reviews.title: Big even for a foot with high instep.
customer_reviews.text: Cute sandal and fairly comfortable, however it is a bit large at the top of the foot. I have high insteps and these are a little loose on the left foot. I debated sending them back but, think I can deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Slater

customer_reviews.title: Cute AND Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Clark’s lover-and nearly every time I am fully pleased with my purchase. This time is no different. The sandals are really comfortable-the footbed is a brushed material, very soft. I wear a 9 M, that’s what I ordered and they fit like a glove. They’re lightweight, cute and I’m glad I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: DLH

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: Sad I had to return these shows. Were not comfortable at all where the material lays on top on the foot--felt like rough plastic. SO unusual for Clarks!
customer_reviews.author: Reader 1

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sandal, super comfortable and durable. The price was about right.
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute I get a lot of compliments. Super comfortable but I ordered the wide and they're a little bit too wide. Next time I'll order the medium. I will probably order another pair in another color later.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Titterington

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. I usually have trouble finding sandals that are comfortable due to bunions on the sides on my feet. These sandals are not only attractive but hide the bunions without irritation. I usually order a 9M but went to a 9.5M for added comfort. Arch offers great support. Definitely thinking about ordering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: pattyp

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have feet problems and I usually wear Birki's that are so comfortable from the moment I slip them on. I hear countless affirmations about Clark's and I wanted to buy a pair with a small heel so I ordered these. I was so disappointed!!! I always wear a M width and these were a bit tight across the toe strap. Yes, they were light weight. No, there wasn't any arch support. I thought there would be more padding. I might try a Lesi bottom instead of the Lexi bottom - I've heard that from the Clark's representative on QVC. I sent this pair back reluctantly because they are cute.
customer_reviews.author: DianeJ

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Just got these shoes and they are just as cute as the picture. They seem quite comfy, so far....but, I haven't worn them for any real length of time yet. I think they run just a tad small. I'm a pretty consistent size 8 and I think these run just a tiny bit small. Not small enough that I can't wear them or that I will return them, but they're "right there". If you are squeezing into a size 8 normally, you might want to go up 1/2 a size. Other than that, the quality and comfort look great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable lightweight sandal
customer_reviews.text: This very lightweight shoe is attractive and it fits (size 8 Narrow). I don't like "bling" on a shoe, but the beaded decoration and petal design on this shoe is just right for me. I have a hard time finding the right sandals since the majority of shoes are medium - wide. So far, it feels supportive; I will know more after wearing it while working in my retail job. I buy Clarks shoes more cautiously than in the past. Since it has been produced in China, the materials are not as high of quality and the "life" of the shoe is shorter. However, the product is still acceptable, particularly at sale prices.
customer_reviews.author: MissA

customer_reviews.title: This style of Clarks is my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: I have at least a dozen pairs of Clarks sandals in different styles. This one is my very favorite. I have it in multiple colors. They have a small elastic insert in the instep that makes them fit perfectly. I have some that are 4 years old and still holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Shoe, But Runs a Bit Smaller, Order a Wide if you can
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, but hoping with wear the leather will loosen up. It's a little tight and digs into my left foot. Other than that it's a cute sandal. The straps come up higher on the foot than other sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: It's cute
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and this pair was nice looking shoes. However the arch was not high enough for me. Sorry I have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Island

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are so comfortable I could walk in them all day long. They are like walking on air. I've had a lot of trouble getting sandals that don't hurt my feet, but I found these, tried then and order three more pairs in different color. I go rid of all my old sandals.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very close fit !
customer_reviews.text: This was my First pair of Clark's shoes ever. They were an exact 8. Normally shoes give a bit extra room and I like that but in order to get that with Clark's I would suggest ordering a half size bigger. The wide with was perfect, however on the right shoe I got it was a bit wider than the left and with the higher heel it caused my toes to slide over the edge. I am considering purchasing a 8 1/2 wide next time to get the room I like. Oh, and after lots of price researching in stores and on the internet, this is by far the best price available for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these sandals in the color I desired and I needed them quickly. They fit and were as comfortable as expected for a discounted price. I was happy to be able to fulfill all of this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable as all Clark's Lexi sandals are. I have found that Clark's Lexi and Leisa sandal footbeds are longwearing and offer great comfort and support for me, which is important since I have had plantar fasciitis in the past. Clark's are the only sandals I buy, and the fact that they are leather is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Tebby

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is sooo comfortable, I usually don't spend this much on shoes but I wanted nice sandals and i've heard great things about this brand and so i took the leap. squishy and very comfortable to walk around in.
customer_reviews.author: browne

customer_reviews.title: All things considered.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the shoe though it was a little wide up closer to the ankle. But then my ankles are kind of skinny. I have no complaints. I like the look of the shoe. It's light weight and comfortable. I would buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Etta Baker

customer_reviews.title: Clark's great quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are replacing similar Clark's sandals that finally broke down after about ten years. They are just as comfortable as expected and have good support. I customarily wear a 7 medium width which is what I ordered, and these fit just fine with no problems at all. I will definitely buy Clark's again.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and color, great arch support too!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Clark’s! I couldn’t believe that they came in extra wide & are really pretty! With the extra wide, my feet still have room to remain comfortable if they swell. I feel like I can walk for miles in these. Perfect to wear to work and on vacation. The color is exactly as shown, nice neutral color to go with anything else I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Nylyram

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Looking Style
customer_reviews.text: Not a good fit for my feet. I always buy Clarks and they fit perfect. This was the first style that no matter the size, it just wasn't a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrial

customer_reviews.title: Fit great = Great Arch Support!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are great! I like the color that looks good with everything and the insole is nicely padded. It has a good arch support. I've had many complements on them! I bought this second pair, because I am so happy with the first ones and want to wear these for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: cw

customer_reviews.title: Bit too large on my 9.5N foot, but I love these sandals anyway!
customer_reviews.text: Clarks sandals are great, but they just run a little too wide for my 9.5N foot, even though that is the size I bought. I own two different slide sandals styles in Clark's, and both are a bit too wide, I never feel totally secure in them. If I wear terry socks they are ok, but who wears terry socks with sandals? Naturalizer sandals fit me the best, but I couldn't find any slide styles I wanted. If these fit you well, then great, because I love the feel of them, just wish they were a bit snugger. And they are attractive too!
customer_reviews.author: Butterfly Lady

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I really like them! I can’t wait to try another pair. My feet are a little wide but I bought the regular width. I figured they would stretch a little as I continued to wear them. I might try the wide to see if I like them better. I also have plantar fasciitis and my feet hurt if there isn’t enough support. I’m able to wear them all day with little to no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE Clark's Narrow Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my favorite pairs of shoes Ever! The color is a really pretty shell coral pink, a bit lighter than the picture. Super flattering to untanned white redhead legs. They go with everything! Enough heal to wear with casual dresses. The mushy awesome sole is so comfortable that they're like wearing running shoes. I'm so grateful that Clark's makes Narrow sizes! It's so hard to find shoes for my narrow feet. I own 7 pairs of Narrow Clark's and I love them all. Especially since their new designs aren't as frumpy as they used to be. Now they're very hip and the most comfortable shoes to be found. I could totally sell these!
customer_reviews.author: Sirena Pendragon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Clark's shoes and sandals and these didn't disappoint. I've worn them for hours on end without any discomfort. They have a soft foot bed with just the right size heel, medium in height. Ordered my normal size and they fit perfectly. You can wear them with shorts, jeans, skirts, summer dresses or into the fall. If you're on the fence about ordering, don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: MamaMar

customer_reviews.title: Well made, comfortable pretty shoe
customer_reviews.text: Clarks make a very good quality shoe. This style has a much cushier footbed than all my other Clarks. I really like the heel height, not too tall, and easy to walk in and stand all day in at work. My new favorite shoe
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Check width
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 9m, but bought both narrow and medium to try. It’s a good thing because the 9n fit me perfectly and I sent the medium back. I don’t have a high arch either. They are very comfortable shoes, and b/c they’re Clark’s made well.
customer_reviews.author: M. Unsell

customer_reviews.title: Great for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: The Myrtle sandal by Clarks affords total comfort because it is available in such a range of sizes. If you have long narrow feet (think Olive Oyl) and despair of finding shoes that do not flop off of your feet, try Clarks in narrow widths. Thank you, Clarks, for remembering that offering special sizes does not just mean offering a few wides. I ordered these in CORAL. It is a lovely, subdued, natural looking coral, not a bright orange at all. Although I wear coral often, I could wear these shoes with many other colors because they are nearly neutral, i.e., neutral as long as you blend them with warm colors. The shade is very flattering to feet and legs.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Another great Clarks sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have many Clarks sandals, shoes and boots. These are a great addition to my shoe collection. I got them in black, as the black Clarks slides I had worn and loved FOREVER finally fell apart (literally--I had to tape them with duct tape to get home! Keep in mind, this was after at least 7 years of very frequent wear, so I'd say I got my money's worth!). These look great on my size 10 foot and my usual 10M fit well, no sizing issues. The flower detail makes it very cute. Comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal!
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are very comfortable, pretty and fun to wear. Great job on quality. I highly recommend these sandals! They come in "Wide" also which was a lot lifesaver for me!
customer_reviews.author: SHERI LELAND

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little small.
customer_reviews.text: Like the color combo (black with tan beads). I thought they were a bit small and the leather was a little stiff.. after wearing them a couple of times they are now ok. The footbed part is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my wife and she is very happy with them. She really likes the Clark brand and found the to be comfortable and true fitting. Finding a size 5 in a style you like and fits properly from stores can be difficult so being able to order with the free shipping and free return (if needed) was beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are so so comfortable! I tried on a pair at Clark's that was a half size bigger but decided I wanted a 5. These fit perfect and can't get over how comfortable they are. I wear them daily!
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Buy the sandals base on your larger foot. They will be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sandals. They are the perfect size for me. 71/2 wide. My feet hurt a lot and the sandals are comfortable. The picture online is accurate. The color is close to what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: Very tight and pinchy in toe area. I normally get narrow size in clarks, but this seemed WAY to narrow. And it wasn't as soft as usual...too scratchy on toes....sending back. Also, right show was visibly longer than than the left. Poor quality control on these.
customer_reviews.author: KatC

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I got narrow width which is what I usually wear. But they are a little too tight but with a little bit of wear they should fit good. Super cute though and glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi D Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but one of five straps is too loose on both sandals.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sandals, but the straps closest to my ankles were stretched out. They are raised from my feet. I think the cardboard that is used to keep the shape must have stretched the straps. Otherwise, ok.
customer_reviews.author: ANNETTE  MARINKO

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Cute- True to Size
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals and I’ve gotten asked about them every time I wear them. I usually wear a 10 but went with a 9.5. It fit perfectly. These are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: M. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Stiffer than Previously Bought Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this type/Brand for many years, buying several pair each season. This shoe is stiffer than I like and does not provide as much arch support as some models.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow and overpriced for the average comfort and quality
customer_reviews.text: I should know better than to buy Clarks-I'm embarrassed for them that they call this narrow shoe a 'wide'. And while I find that most Clark's shoes are somewhat overpriced for the average quality, this $90 sandal takes the cake. I'll keep with Softspots and SAS for real quality and true sizing for the same price as this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not as cute as the picture
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes and they are cute, but they are a bit more "old lady" looking than I like. Also, the right shoe seems smaller that's the left.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Dombovy

customer_reviews.title: Well fitting sandal in wide size
customer_reviews.text: These felt great as soon as I tried these on. The leather flower with beads is a pretty design, with the beads firmly stitched on. I wear a wide size in my shoes and the footbed is wide enough for no overhang of the sides of my foot. The leather upper is roomy and not tight. The footbed is cushioned and comfortable and the heel height is nice, between flat and too much.
customer_reviews.author: S.Moon

customer_reviews.title: Double check your size and with a foot
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sandals if you have a narrow foot I suggest a wide if you have a wide foot I suggest the extra wide I had to order a second pair to first pair was too skinny so I'm going to get some shoe stretchers to see if I can stretch it out and wear them to otherwise well-made very pretty and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Wide is narrow
customer_reviews.text: Advertised it as if it were a wide width there's no way these are wide width. I didn't realize this until after my time frame was up to send them back, so now I'm stuck with a pair of brand new shoes I'll never wear.
customer_reviews.author: Elehcem

customer_reviews.title: Clarks Lexi Myrtle Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Since these do not come in a slim size and no 10 and 1/2 I had to make do with the 11 Narrow, but I did order another pair after the first pair got ruined and I wear them around the house and like them. Mainly I have to have them to protect my Achilles tendons which are torn so I can't wear flat shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Savta

customer_reviews.title: Another great sandal
customer_reviews.text: Cant go wrong with CLARKS shoe collection. Love everything they make. Quality is right for the price, and fit just right, for my WIDE feet. Always buy their shoes cause they never disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen cecchini

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I was having a hard time finding anything in true peach locally. Thank God for Amazon... They really are a nice shade of peach, similar to what's in fashion this season (not the bright coral/orange, but peach). They fit true to size just like all Clarks and are super comfy. They have a bit higher heel than I'm used to but overall only about 3". My mom saw them in a store about 2 weeks after I bought them here and they were selling for $20 more! Yay for a bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pike

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is cute and comfortable. They were a few more dollars on Amazon, but the Clark website was out of stock on the size that I needed. There is no break in period and you can wear them right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy E.

customer_reviews.title: Great find of narrow shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to be able to get narrow shoe from Clark’s via internet. Very hard to get in local Mall, almost nonexistent, very important in any sort of slide or sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Beidler

customer_reviews.title: I love Lexi!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe; love this heel; I wishes Clark’s made some fall/winter shoes with this heel. It is the right height to keep my plantar fasciitis under controls. I have several different styles of Clark’s with this heel.
customer_reviews.author: J Hayes

customer_reviews.title: the fit is great.. super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a black pair .. the fit is great.. super comfortable.. that is why I bought them in this color as well.. I wore the black pair for the last year 3/4 of the time they are still in great shape... money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: BLSD

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love the sandals. They fit just a quarter of a size tighter than other Clarks sandals (length and width both).
customer_reviews.author: RockyFan

product_meta.title: Clarks Women's Lexi Myrtle Sandal
product_meta.description: Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately not_applicable from arch
